articles.title: US tariffs on European goods threaten to shake up the world's largest 2-way trade relationship - AP News
articles.description: America’s largest trade partner is awaiting word on whether U.S. President Donald Trump will impose punishing tariffs on its goods. Trump imposed a 20% import tax on all European Union products as part of a set of tariffs targeting countries with which the Un…
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) Americas largest trade partner, the European Union, is among the entities awaiting word Monday on whether U.S. President Donald Trump will impose punishing tariffs on their go… [+7146 chars]
